rating_comment: A privately neat place to stay in calm and have some good time. Extra toiletries could be an add on to the place. Otherwise everything you need is there. Reasonable for a family stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Mahmud was very flexible and supportive when I wanted to check out late. He replied to me very quickly and managed to arrange me to stay longer when I checked out. I apprecaited his flexibility and kind support.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
The place was private but also close to the main road and with walking distance to all the nearby restaurants. So it was easy for me to enjoy a peaceful stay with the convenience easy commute.
The behaviour of the place owner was nice and professional. Checking in was smooth. He also helped me later on with my queries of the place.
Due to the place having all the benefits I needed, I really enjoyed staying there.
I highly recommend it to people who want to stay in a peaceful, clean, convenient home.
